root.name: Last Duel: Inter Planet War 2012
root.description: Queen Sheeta has been kidnapped by the Galden Tribe. The Mu-ans have built a vehicle that has immense firepower and they plan to use it to rescue the queen.Guide the vehicle through six levels that alternate between ground attack and air attack. Destroy any Galden Tribe vehicle that gets in your way, collect power ups, collect extra time, defeat end of level bosses but above all save the Queen Sheeta.
